mobiles.name: ranger adventurer
mobiles.long_description: An Elven ranger from Celene is scouting the peninsula.
mobiles.description: He wants to see what Turrosh Mak is planning.

mobiles.name: hill giant
mobiles.long_description: A hungry hill giant waves a large bone club at at you!
mobiles.description: He looks like he's about to have dinner (maybe it's you?).

mobiles.name: tiny Orc
mobiles.long_description: A tiny Orc wanders about.
mobiles.description: Rather small for an Orc warrior, looks like a reject.

mobiles.name: turrosh mak
mobiles.long_description: His most ferocious Majesty, the Despot, Turrosh Mak.
mobiles.description: You can't tell which kind of Orc it is, maybe it's a bit o' all of them?

mobiles.name: small Orc
mobiles.long_description: A small, rather non-descript Orc.
mobiles.description: A small Orc, a resident of the Pomarj.

mobiles.name: medium Orc raider
mobiles.long_description: An Orc raider.
mobiles.description: An Orc raider, returned from the good Elven kingdom of Celene.

mobiles.name: large Orc
mobiles.long_description: A large Orc, member of Turrosh Maks warband.
mobiles.description: A large Orc, member of Turrosh Maks warband.

mobiles.name: shargaas Orc priest
mobiles.long_description:
The high priest of Shargaas the Nightlord, orc god of darkness, 
caves and death.
mobiles.description: This black skinned Orc reeks with evil knowlege and power.

mobiles.name: Gruumsh Orc priest
mobiles.long_description: This huge battle scarred Orc worships Gruumsh, Orc god of Fire and Strength.
mobiles.description:
This Orc is clad in black plate mail with a red eye on the chest. 
He wields the everburning torch of Gruumsh.

mobiles.name: bahgtru Orc priest
mobiles.long_description: A hugely muscled priest of Bahgtru, Orc god of battle.
mobiles.description: This dirty tan skinned Orc is the largest youve ever seen.

mobiles.name: Priest of Ilneval Orc priest
mobiles.long_description: This tall unsmiling Orc is the priest of Ilneval, god of warfare.
mobiles.description: He is clad in red chainmail and wields a bloody broadsword.

mobiles.name: yurtrus orc priest
mobiles.long_description: An orcish giant covered with peeling and rotting green flesh.
mobiles.description:
His hands are entirely normal, save for being chalk white.
He seems to have no mouth.

mobiles.name: swamp troll
mobiles.long_description: A bad smelling swamp troll ambles about.
mobiles.description: Its big and wet and slimy.

mobiles.name: fire giant
mobiles.long_description: A large fire giant waves a 10 foot long black sword in one hand.
mobiles.description: It smolders as it considers eating you.

mobiles.name: fen troll
mobiles.long_description: A green slimy warty troll hunts small orcs.
mobiles.description: It looks a little icky.

mobiles.name: goblin
mobiles.long_description: A small goblin.
mobiles.description: It seems to be a small ugly scaly person!

mobiles.name: orog Orc
mobiles.long_description: An Orc-Ogre cross breed scavenges for food.
mobiles.description: Help me I'm ugly.

mobiles.name: half Orc
mobiles.long_description: A half-orc sharpens his dagger against a rock.
mobiles.description: Yeah I'm your half brother.

mobiles.name: dire wolf
mobiles.long_description: A large dire wolf sniffs around.
mobiles.description: He doesn't want to play fetch.

mobiles.name: gnoll Orc
mobiles.long_description: A filthy smelly Gnoll brandishes a spiked club.
mobiles.description: A filthy smelly Gnoll brandishes a spiked club.

mobiles.name: thief Orc
mobiles.long_description: An Orcish thief sneaks up on you.
mobiles.description: Ooops he says.

mobiles.name: kobold Orc
mobiles.long_description: A small dog faced humanoid smells funny.
mobiles.description: Ewww stinky.

mobiles.name: scout Orc
mobiles.long_description: A scout for the empire of Turrosh Mak sneaks by.
mobiles.description: A scout for the empire of Turrosh Mak sneaks by.

mobiles.name: bugbear
mobiles.long_description: A big hairy creature with large teeth and pointy ears, eyes you up.
mobiles.description: 7 feet tall, orange brown fur, nose like a bear - need i say more?

mobiles.name: fire giant
mobiles.long_description: A large fire giant ambassador loudly proclaims his allegiance to Turrosh Mak
mobiles.description:
As you look you see what seems to be a face and almost a 
humanoid figure somehow trapped in the fire.

mobiles.name: storm giant
mobiles.long_description: A massive blue giant is an emmissary to Turrosh Mak.
mobiles.description: A hude humanoid figure seems to an elemental manifestaion of a storm.

mobiles.name: frost giant
mobiles.long_description: A large pale giant in wolf furs is an emmissary to Turrosh Mak.
mobiles.description: A humanoid figure encased in ice and furs.

mobiles.name: stone giant
mobiles.long_description: The stone giant considers you in stoney silence.
mobiles.description: A humanoid figure trapped in stone seems alive.

mobiles.name: cloud giant
mobiles.long_description: A huge giant figure seemingly made up of clouds.
mobiles.description: A humanoid figure is trapped in the rushing wind.

mobiles.name: Orc Orcish witchdoctor
mobiles.long_description: An Orcish witchdoctor practices his voodoo.
mobiles.description:
The Orcish witchdoctor has come here in search of the fabled
Stone of Surrender which can be used to render opponents senseless.

mobiles.name: warrior gruumsh
mobiles.long_description: A fanatical warrior of Gruumsh waves his spiked mace menacingly.
mobiles.description: Damn religous fanatics, can never get rid of them.

mobiles.name: goblin illusionist
mobiles.long_description: The goblin illusionist scares away small Orcs with his spells.
mobiles.description:
He seeks their aid for a powerful new spell of deception.

<wielded>            The Sword of Illusions

mobiles.name: Orc shaman
mobiles.long_description: An Orcish shaman wanders by in search of magical herbs.
mobiles.description: Rare herbs are rumored to grow only in the Pomarj.

mobiles.name: baby red dragon
mobiles.long_description: A baby red dragon plays with goblinoid children, occasionaly eating a few.
mobiles.description: It's only a baby by dragon standards.

mobiles.name: imp
mobiles.long_description: A little quickling runs along being annoying.
mobiles.description: The little bugger steals stuff and is generally obnoxious.

mobiles.name: HUGE Orc
mobiles.long_description: A HUGE Orc stands here.
mobiles.description: HUGE, need i say more?

mobiles.name: a drow merchant
mobiles.long_description: A drow merchant is on his way to trade with Turrosh Mak.
mobiles.description: I WOULD NOT suggest you attack me ...!

objects.name: ring of the Pomarj
objects.description: A dark ring which seems to absorb all the light around it lies here.

objects.name: breastplate black iron breast plate
objects.description: A breastplate made of the black iron from deep within the earth lies here.

objects.name: ever flaming torch
objects.description: A torch made of fire crackles mysteriously here.

objects.name: cape flame flaming red
objects.description: A cape made of ethereal red fiber lies neatly folded on the ground here.

objects.name: boots wind
objects.description: A pair of boots made from the hide of a baby Pegasus.

objects.name: helmet storm
objects.description: A helmet that looks like it has weathered many storms has been set here.

objects.name: sword of Ilneval
objects.description: A sword crackling with power lies here.

objects.name: shield ilneval
objects.description: A shield made entirely of energy buzzes here.

objects.name: winter wolf pelt icy
objects.short_description: a pelt of a winter wolf
objects.description: The pelt of a winter wolf who disobeyed its master lies here.

objects.name: cloak slimey
objects.description: A disgusting rotten cloak has been abandoned here.

objects.name: amulet spinecastle
objects.description: An amulet carved into strange and grotesque patters lies here.

objects.name: bracelet medegian lost ships
objects.short_description: the Medegian bracelet of lost ships
objects.description: A bracelet made of magical coral.

objects.name: armbands platinum bands
objects.description: A pair of platinum arm bands, once worn by the hill giant, lie here.

objects.name: legbands platinum bands
objects.description: A pair of platinum leg bands, once worn by the hill giant, lie here.

objects.name: wand
objects.description: A fire wand lies forgotten on the ground.

objects.name: staff ice
objects.description: A ice staff lies forgotten on the ground.

objects.name: staff earthquake
objects.description: A earthquake staff lies forgotten on the ground.

objects.name: wand air wind
objects.short_description: orc wand of wind and air
objects.description: An air wand lies forgotten on the ground.

objects.name: wand
objects.description: A lightning wand lies forgotten on the ground.

objects.name: spiked club
objects.description: A large spiked club lies on the ground.

objects.name: lode load lodestone loadstone stone
objects.description: A dull red rock lies here amid the weeds.

objects.name: torch
objects.description: A flaming torch burns on the ground.

objects.name: energy scroll
objects.description: A scroll of energy replacement lies here.

objects.name: ale jug
objects.description: A large jug of ale stands here.

objects.name: pipeweed
objects.description: A pile of pipeweed has gathered here.

objects.name: flametounge sword
objects.description: A longsword surrounded by buring flames lies here.

objects.name: frostbrand sword
objects.description: A longsword surrounded by a shimmering field of ice lies here.

objects.name: mattock of the titans
objects.description: A huge mattock has ben embedded in the ground!

objects.name: star morning
objects.description: A chain with a star on the end lies here.

objects.name: torturers whip
objects.description: An evil whip has been abandoned here.

objects.name: elixir anti
objects.description: An potion to ward off elves has been left here.

rooms.name: A Mountain Path
rooms.description:
You are on a mountain path which ascends a steep mountainside.  The trail
curves around the mountain so that you cannot really see what lies ahead.
You do sense great evil though coming from the area behind the mountain.

rooms.name: A Mountain Path
rooms.description:
You are on a rocky mountain path leading up and around a steep mountainside.
You sense an evil presence from the area beyond the mountain, which you cannot 
see yet.

rooms.name: Mountainside Tombs
rooms.description:
There are a few stone heaps here and there, the tombs of those who did not
last the arduous journey up the mountain.  Curiously you notice a few
uncovered bodies which don't seem to have died of exhaustion.  The path curves
east around the mountain.

extra_descr_data.description: They look as if their necks have been broken and their flesh, chewed.

You are sure glad that YOU aren't under one of those piles!
Many of the tombstones have the same name on them, 'Avalon'.  He must come
here a lot.

rooms.name: A Blind Curve on the Mountain Path.
rooms.description:
This looks like a normal mountain path, but it is NOT!  This section of the
path is habitated by a huge (and of course, man-eating) Hill giant.  The path
makes its final ascent to an overlook.

rooms.name: Vista
rooms.description:
This is a stunning vista overlooking the Pomarj Peninsula.  There is a sign here that says:

	BEHOLD -- The Orcish empire of Turrosh Mak, ruler of the Pomarj

Fire leaps up from burning pyres in the western part of the Pomarj.  There is a 
rise at the end of the peninsula to the north.  To the east you see a stagnant
swamp, along the shoreline of the Azure sea. Also to the east you spy a cave entrance
leading into the Pomarj peninsula.  The path descends to the north to another
overlook.

rooms.name: The Overlook
rooms.description:
You see various Orc servants wandering around the Pomarj.  The noise of
activity coming from the Pomarj gets louder.  The path makes a steep descent
into a shallow vally from here.

rooms.name: Entrance to Orcish Empire of the Pomarj
rooms.description:
You are awed by the sounds and sights of great powers at works here.
Orc servants bustle back and forth doing the biddings of the Orc
priests.  You see a sort of cross roads to the north, and you can climb up to
the overlook here.

rooms.name: The Pomarj Peninsula
rooms.description:
Various Orc soldiers and camp followers wander the Pomarj Peninsula.  
Some seem to be going about their business, seting up camps and cook 
fires, while others are sharpening weapons, polishing armor, and having 
mock combats.  The Pomarj continues north and east.

rooms.name: The Pomarj Peninsula
rooms.description:
To the west a path dips and winds among some flowing firepits.  To the
northeast a path goes toward the swamp.  Beyond toward the northeast and
northwest are outcrops which rise up from the Pomarj peninsula. To the east there
is a cave mouth which leads into the Pomarj wall.  And to the south the path
leads up, away, and out of the Pomarj.  Various pure and cross-breeds of
Orc forms wander the Pomarj peninsula, which extends in a wide swath
northwards.

rooms.name: The peninsula of the Pomarj
rooms.description:
Various Orc forms wander the peninsula of the Pomarj.  Some seem to be
going about their business, while others seem to have no business at
all.  In general, it is calm, yet there is always a incessant buzz of
things going on about.  The Pomarj peninsula extends north and west.  There is a
cave mouth set into the Pomarj wall to the east.

rooms.name: The peninsula of the Pomarj
rooms.description:
Various Orc soldiers and camp followers wander the Pomarj Peninsula.  
Some seem to be going about their business, seting up camps and cook 
fires, while others are sharpening weapons, polishing armor, and having 
mock combats.  The Pomarj peninsula extends off to the north, east,
and south.

rooms.name: The Pomarj Peninsula
rooms.description:
Various Orc soldiers and camp followers wander the Pomarj Peninsula.  
Some seem to be going about their business, seting up camps and cook 
fires, while others are sharpening weapons, polishing armor, and having 
mock combats.  The Pomarj peninsula extends in all directions.

rooms.name: The Pomarj Peninsula
rooms.description:
Various Orc soldiers and camp followers wander the Pomarj Peninsula.  
Some seem to be going about their business, seting up camps and cook 
fires, while others are sharpening weapons, polishing armor, and having 
mock combats.  The Pomarj peninsula extends north, south, and west.
A path leads into the swamp to the east.

rooms.name: The Pomarj Peninsula
rooms.description:
Various Orc soldiers and camp followers wander the Pomarj Peninsula.  
Some seem to be going about their business, seting up camps and cook 
fires, while others are sharpening weapons, polishing armor, and having 
mock combats.   The Pomarj peninsula extends north, east, and south.
To the west you see open fire pits.

rooms.name: The Pomarj Peninsula
rooms.description:
Various Orc soldiers and camp followers wander the Pomarj Peninsula.  
Some seem to be going about their business, seting up camps and cook 
fires, while others are sharpening weapons, polishing armor, and having 
mock combats.  The Pomarj peninsula extends in all directions.

rooms.name: The Pomarj Peninsula
rooms.description:
Various Orc soldiers and camp followers wander the Pomarj Peninsula.  
Some seem to be going about their business, seting up camps and cook 
fires, while others are sharpening weapons, polishing armor, and having 
mock combats.  The Pomarj peninsula extends north, south and west.

rooms.name: The Pomarj Peninsula
rooms.description:
Various Orc soldiers and camp followers wander the Pomarj Peninsula.  
Some seem to be going about their business, seting up camps and cook 
fires, while others are sharpening weapons, polishing armor, and having 
mock combats.  You can climb a rise in the peninsula to the north.

rooms.name: The Pomarj Peninsula
rooms.description:
Various Orc soldiers and camp followers wander the Pomarj Peninsula.  
Some seem to be going about their business, seting up camps and cook 
fires, while others are sharpening weapons, polishing armor, and having 
mock combats.  The Pomarj peninsula extends east, south, and west.

rooms.name: The Pomarj Peninsula
rooms.description:
Various Orc soldiers and camp followers wander the Pomarj Peninsula.  
Some seem to be going about their business, seting up camps and cook 
fires, while others are sharpening weapons, polishing armor, and having 
mock combats.  You can climb a rise in the peninsula to the north.

rooms.name: Dark Cave
rooms.description:
You notice a path winding east among some huge boulders.  You feel a powerful
source of evil from that direction.

rooms.name: Darker Caves
rooms.description:
You can barely see your way even with a light source.  The rocks of the cave
are even darker than the darkness.  You hear a powerful chanting all around
you.  Cave paths go south and east roughly, its hard to tell exactly when you
can't see where you are going.

rooms.name: Darker Caves
rooms.description:
You can barely see your way even with a light source.  The rocks of the cave
are even darker than the darkness.  You hear a powerful chanting all around
you.  Cave paths go south and west roughly; it's hard to tell exactly when you
can't see where you are going.

rooms.name: Darker Caves
rooms.description:
You can barely see your way even with a light source.  The rocks of the cave
are even darker than the darkness.  You hear a powerful chanting all around you.
Cave paths go north, south and east roughly; it's hard to tell exactly when
you can't see where you are going.

rooms.name: Darker Caves
rooms.description:
You can barely see your way even with a light source.  The rocks of the cave
are even darker than the darkness.  You hear a powerful chanting all around you.
Cave paths go north, south and west roughly, it's hard to tell exactly when you
can't see where you are going.

rooms.name: Darkest Caves
rooms.description:
Your light doesn't even seem to work here.  Even magical light sources seem
only to illuminate about a foot ahead of you.  You suddenly realize that the
path has descended quite a bit but you didn't notice before because of the
darkness.  You sense a great presence off to the east aways.

rooms.name: Darkest Caves
rooms.description:
Your light doesn't even seem to work here.  Even magical light sources seem
only to illuminate about a foot ahead of you.  You suddenly realize that the
path has descended quite a bit but you didn't notice before because of the
darkness.  You sense a great presence directly to the east.

rooms.name: Temple of Shargaas the Nightlord
rooms.description:
This is the abode of the priest of Shargaas.  He decides about assasinations,
poisonings, and murders.  The priest sits upon a huge black marble throne
carved into the wall.

extra_descr_data.description:
The priest notices your stare, and doesn't like it one bit!  The whole
earth seems to shake with his emotion.

rooms.name: By the Swamp
rooms.description:
The stagnant water in the swamp seems to swarm with insects.  Half submerged
in the swamp are rotting elven bodies.  The path leads north closer
to the Azure sea. To the west you see a T-intersection.

rooms.name: In the Swamp
rooms.description:
To continue you had to walk right into the swamp.  You walk along in stagnant
water up to your knees, and you feel leeches clinging to you.  A bay stretches out to
the north and the swamp goes south.

rooms.name: The Azure Sea
rooms.description:
The water is crystal clear here and you can see the bottom of the bay 30 feet
below you.  You see sharks not to far in the distance.

rooms.name: The Azure Sea
rooms.description:
The water is crystal clear here and you can see the bottom of the bay 30 feet
below you.  You see sharks not to far in the distance.

rooms.name: The Azure Sea
rooms.description:
The water is crystal clear here and you can see the bottom of the bay 30 feet
below you.  You see sharks not to far in the distance.

rooms.name: The Azure Sea
rooms.description:
The water is crystal clear here and you can see the bottom of the bay 30 feet
below you.  You see sharks not to far in the distance.

rooms.name: The Azure Sea
rooms.description:
The water is crystal clear here and you can see the bottom of the bay 30 feet
below you.  You see sharks not to far in the distance.

rooms.name: The Azure Sea
rooms.description:
The water is crystal clear here and you can see the bottom of the bay 30 feet
below you.  You see sharks not to far in the distance.

rooms.name: Temple of Yertrus
rooms.description:
This chamber has ben dug out of the swamp floor, not far from the sea. It looks
like it's been here for a long, long time.  There is a disgusting stench coming
from a rotting corpse sitting on a slime encrusted throne, oops that corpse just 
opened its eyes!

rooms.name: A Fiery Pathway
rooms.description:
You tread carefully along a path which dips and turns among geysers of fire.
Miniature volcanoes spew lava in rivers.  The fire is hot and extremely
dangerous.  You smell burning flesh all around you. The path extends east and south.

rooms.name: A Fiery Pathway
rooms.description:
You tread carefully along a path which dips and turns among pits of fire and
beds of coals.  A pyre of burning elves to the west glows with an everlasting fire.

rooms.name: The Burning Pyre
rooms.description:
You see pyres of elves all around you, they are screaming in agony, yet the flames
do not seem to consume thier flesh.  A path leads east among some fire pits.

rooms.name: The Temple of Gruumsh
rooms.description: The high priest of Gruumsh sits upon a throne of polished elven bone.

rooms.name: Bone Pathway
rooms.description:
You walk along a pethway made of the bones of Turrosh Maks enemies, you feel a
crunch of a baby elfs skull beneath your heel.  To the north there is a
sunken-in area.  A path leads east also.

rooms.name: The battleground
rooms.description:
You see many Orcs engaged in (not so) mock combat, some are barely higher 
than your waist. You here loud cursed and orders coming from an outcropping
not far from you.  The battleground extends north and east.

rooms.name: The battleground
rooms.description:
You see many Orcs engaged in (not so) mock combat, some are barely higher 
than your waist. You here loud cursed and orders coming from an outcropping
not far from you.  The battleground extends north and west.

rooms.name: The battleground
rooms.description:
You see many Orcs engaged in (not so) mock combat, some are barely higher 
than your waist. You here loud cursed and orders coming from an outcropping
not far from you.The battleground continues south and east.

rooms.name: The battleground
rooms.description:
You see many Orcs engaged in (not so) mock combat, some are barely higher 
than your waist. You here loud cursed and orders coming from an outcropping
not far from you.

rooms.name: Bone Causeway
rooms.description:
Up a set of stairs carved into the hill you see a large orc in red chainmail
atop an iron throne, he is yelling orders at the soldiers below him. To the west
is the battleground.

rooms.name: The Temple of Ilneval
rooms.description:
The Priest of Ilneval sits upon an iron throne, and supervises the Orc battle 
training from here. He wields a sword and shield of pure magic. Steps from here 
lead down to the battleground.

rooms.name: Pile of Skulls
rooms.description:
A bone path starts to the west.  The pile of skulls continues to the east.
Or you can climb down to the Pomarj peninsula to the south.

rooms.name: Pile of Skulls
rooms.description:
A bone path starts to the north.  The pile of skulls continues to the west.
Or you can climb down to the Pomarj peninsula to the south.

rooms.name: Along the clifftops
rooms.description:
Last you knew, you were walking on the pile of skulls.  Abruptly the pile 
ended atop a granite cliff face with blood red iron ore streaked through it.
You see elven noblemen and noblewoman staked out in the sun, it is hard to 
tell whether they are dead or alive.  The cliffs continue to the north and east.
The pile of skulls you came from is to the south.

rooms.name: Along the Clifftops
rooms.description:
You look down and see the azure sea 100 feet below you.  In the distance across 
the expanse of the Wooley bay, you see the shores of the Bright Desert.  To the 
east aways you spy an archway.  To the west is more thin air.

rooms.name: Along the Clifftops
rooms.description:
You look down and see the azure sea 100 feet below you.  In the distance across 
the expanse of the Wooley bay, you see the shores of the Bright Desert.  To the 
east aways you spy an archway.  To the south is more thin air.

rooms.name: Along the Clifftops
rooms.description:
You look down and see the azure sea 100 feet below you.  In the distance across 
the expanse of the Wooley bay, you see the shores of the Bright Desert.  To the 
east aways you spy an archway.  There is a hideously carved archway leading into
a cave here. It is to the east.  You can continue south or west if you'd like.

extra_descr_data.description: Through the archway you see a tunnel.

rooms.name: Tunnel lined with corpses
rooms.description:
A cave leads east.  It is lined with corpses of Elven Knights of Luna, many still
in their elven plate mail and holding fine forged weapons. They all bear the scars
and wounds of prolonged torture.

extra_descr_data.description: Through the archway you see nothing but sky.

rooms.name: Temple of Bahgtru
rooms.description:
You enter a granite chamber.  The walls are lined with weapons, armor and 
battle standards of deafeated enemies. A gigantic, dirty tan skinned, muscular
Orc sits atop a throne made of elven children.  A cave leads west.

extra_descr_data.description:
Although the bone throne appears solid enough to sit on, I wouldn't try
it if I were you!
